data.instructions:
# Query API Test Validation Handoff

## Context
Branch: claude/evaluate-query-language-usability-BUe5R
Added 139 tests across 6 files to protect Query API.

## Validation Steps

### Step 1: Run New Tests
```bash
python -m pytest tests/unit/got/test_pattern_matcher.py \
  tests/unit/got/test_query_api_contracts.py \
  tests/unit/got/test_query_api_invariants.py \
  tests/behavioral/test_query_api_workflows.py \
  tests/performance/test_query_api_perf.py \
  tests/integration/test_query_api_integration.py -v
```
EXPECTED: 139 passed, 2 skipped

### Step 2: Full Regression Check
```bash
python -m pytest tests/ -q --tb=no
```
EXPECTED: No regressions

### Step 3: Performance Stability (run 3x)
```bash
for i in 1 2 3; do python -m pytest tests/performance/test_query_api_perf.py -q; done
```
EXPECTED: All 3 runs pass

### Step 4: Verify CLAUDE.md Patterns
```bash
grep -c "DON'T use Pattern.edge" CLAUDE.md
grep -c "DON'T pass arguments to PathFinder.explain" CLAUDE.md
```
EXPECTED: Each returns 1

## Success Criteria
- All 139 new tests pass
- No regressions in existing tests
- Performance tests stable across 3 runs
- CLAUDE.md has 4 new Query API patterns

## Reference Documents
- samples/memories/2025-12-27-query-api-testing-knowledge-transfer.md
- samples/memories/2025-12-27-query-api-validation-handoff.md

## On Completion
Use: got_utils.py handoff complete <HANDOFF_ID> --result '{"validated": true, "tests_passed": 139}'
